issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
I can´t install my app on device, with this error on summary. I have tested the simple 'hello world' app and the result is the same.

I´m using a Samsung GT-I3900

I sent the apk via 'adb install Pcode.apk' to device and it installs and runs ok.

The problem is: My app needs to be debugged on device because it uses bluetooth, and i can´t test it on debug mode.

Here is my console log:

comments.body: We have some debug-fixes for Android in Titanium 6.0.0, can you check the latest build (that goes RC this week): http://builds.appcelerator.com/#6_0_X
Hello, Can you send the "appc info" log in here? When the device is connected. Thanks.
